languages.text: {n}Дознаватель чуть прищуривается.{/n} "Я не сказал, что не хотел бы позволять себе подобную роскошь. Более того, в глубине души я понимаю, почему ты поступил{mf||а} именно так... и мне еще предстоит заняться тем, чтобы полностью вытравить такого рода понимание и принятие".

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель чуть прищуривается.{/n} "Я не сказал, что не хотел бы позволять себе подобную роскошь. Более того, в глубине души я понимаю, почему ты поступил{mf||а} именно так... и мне еще предстоит заняться те, чтобы полностью вытравить такого рода понимание и принятие".

languages.text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes narrow.{/n} "I haven't said I would not like to be able to afford such luxury. In fact, deep down I understand why you acted that way... I have yet to eliminate the understanding and acceptance within myself, but I will."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель чуть прищуривается.{/n} "Я не сказал, что не хотел бы позволять себе подобную роскошь. Более того, в глубине души я понимаю, почему ты поступил{mf||а} именно так... и мне еще предстоит заняться тем, чтобы полностью вытравить такого рода понимание и принятие".

traits.locale_text: {n}The investigator's eyes narrow.{/n} "I haven't said I would not like to be able to afford such luxury. In fact, deep down I understand why you acted this way... And the task of eliminating this understanding and acceptance is on my list."

{n}The investigator's eyes narrow.{/n} "I haven't said I would not like to be able to afford such luxury. In fact, deep down I understand why you acted this way... And the task of eliminating this understanding and acceptance is on my list."

{n}The Interrogator's eyes narrow.{/n} "I haven't said I would not like to be able to afford such luxury. In fact, deep down I understand why you acted that way... I have yet to eliminate the understanding and acceptance within myself, but I will."

{n}The Interrogator's eyes narrow.{/n} "I haven't said I would not like to be able to afford such luxury. In fact, deep down I understand why you acted that way... I have yet to eliminate the understanding and acceptance within myself, but I will."

{n}The Interrogator's eyes narrow.{/n} "I haven't said I would not like to be able to afford such luxury. In fact, deep down I understand why you acted that way... I have yet to eliminate the understanding and acceptance within myself, but I will."

languages.text: {n}El interrogador entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «No digo que no me gustaría poder permitirme semejantes lujos. Es más, en el fondo entiendo por qué actuó como lo hizo... Todavía no he logrado erradicar esa comprensión y aceptación en mi interior, pero lo haré».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes narrow.{/n} "I haven't said I would not like to be able to afford such luxury. In fact, deep down I understand why you acted that way... I have yet to eliminate the understanding and acceptance within myself, but I will."

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «No digo que no me gustaría poder permitirme semejantes lujos. Es más, en el fondo entiendo por qué actuó como lo hizo... Todavía no he logrado erradicar esa comprensión y aceptación en mi interior, pero lo haré».

languages.text: {n}审讯官眯起了眼睛。{/n}“我从来没说过我不希望有朝一日能负担得起这种奢侈。老实说，我的内心深处可以理解你为什么会做出那样的选择……我还没有彻底消灭心中的感情与容忍他人的念头，但我会消灭的。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes narrow.{/n} "I haven't said I would not like to be able to afford such luxury. In fact, deep down I understand why you acted that way... I have yet to eliminate the understanding and acceptance within myself, but I will."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判官眯起了眼睛。{/n}“我从来没说过我不希望有朝一日能负担得起这种奢侈。老实说，我的内心深处可以理解你为什么会做出那样的选择……我还没有彻底消灭心中的感情与容忍他人的念头，但我会消灭的。”

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは目を細める。{/n}「そういった贅沢をする余裕を持ちたくないと言っているわけではありません。実際、陛下の行動理由は心の底では理解できますよ…自分の中で理解し受け入れる心は完全には消えていませんが、いずれ消してみせましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes narrow.{/n} "I haven't said I would not like to be able to afford such luxury. In fact, deep down I understand why you acted that way... I have yet to eliminate the understanding and acceptance within myself, but I will."

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは目を細める。{/n}「そういった贅沢をする余裕を持ちたくないと言っているわけではありません。実際、陛下の行動理由は心の底では理解できますよ…自分の中で理解し受け入れる心は完全には消えていませんが、いずれ消してみせましょう」

languages.text: {n} Der Interrogator runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ich habe nicht gesagt, dass ich gegen einen derartigen Luxus etwas einzuwenden hätte. Tatsächlich verstehe ich sogar irgendwie, warum Ihr so gehandelt habt ... Verständnis und Akzeptanz sind zwei Dinge, die ich noch ablegen muss, aber das wird schon."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes narrow.{/n} "I haven't said I would not like to be able to afford such luxury. In fact, deep down I understand why you acted that way... I have yet to eliminate the understanding and acceptance within myself, but I will."

traits.locale_text: {n} Der Interrogator runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ich habe nicht gesagt, dass ich gegen einen derartigen Luxus etwas einzuwenden hätte. Tatsächlich verstehe ich sogar irgendwie, warum Ihr so gehandelt habt ... Verständnis und Akzeptanz sind zwei Dinge, die ich noch ablegen muss, aber das wird schon."

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur plisse les yeux.{/n} « Je n'ai pas dit que je n'aimerais pas me permettre ce luxe. Au fond, je comprends pourquoi vous avez agi ainsi... mais croyez bien que la raison finira par prendre le pas sur cet assentiment. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes narrow.{/n} "I haven't said I would not like to be able to afford such luxury. In fact, deep down I understand why you acted that way... I have yet to eliminate the understanding and acceptance within myself, but I will."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur plisse les yeux.{/n} « Je n'ai pas dit que je n'aimerais pas me permettre ce luxe. Au fond, je comprends pourquoi vous avez agi ainsi... mais croyez bien que la raison finira par prendre le pas sur cet assentiment. »

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu'nun gözleri kısılıyor.{/n} "Duygusal davranma lüksüne sahip olmak istemezdim demedim. Bilakis içten içe neden o şekilde davrandığını anlıyorum. Kendi içimdeki anlayışı ve kabulü tamamen silebilmiş değilim ama sileceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyes narrow.{/n} "I haven't said I would not like to be able to afford such luxury. In fact, deep down I understand why you acted that way... I have yet to eliminate the understanding and acceptance within myself, but I will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu'nun gözleri kısılıyor.{/n} "Duygusal davranma lüksüne sahip olmak istemezdim demedim. Bilakis içten içe neden o şekilde davrandığını anlıyorum. Kendi içimdeki anlayışı ve kabulü tamamen silebilmiş değilim ama sileceğim."
